we Hope To See You Soon!
Peddler's Wagon is centrally located in a landmark 1880’s building in the tree shaded lakeside historic district of downtown Eustis, Florida.
Eustis is located midway between Ocala and Orlando, just a few miles from Mount Dora, and a short drive east of Leesburg and The Villages.
Peddler's Wagon
25 E Magnolia Avenue, Eustis, Florida 32726
352-483-2797

Tuesday - Saturday  10am - 4pm
Closed Sunday/Monday

A Little About Us
Our Beginning
Our Beginning
Our Beginning
Peddler's Wagon began over thirty-five years ago as a crafting business specializing in gift accents of fragrant cinnamon stick. They were offered here in Eustis as well as other shops and boutiques in the U.S and Canada. The shop continued to grow as more carried our fragrant creations including shops in Dollywood, Cypress Gardens, Busch Gardens, and Walt Disney World. Soon afterwards, we began participating in numerous art and craft shows throughout Florida and the Southeast.
With a background in design and floral, we expanded into silk and dried flowers and continued to offer a greater selection of home accent and decor.
For Today
Our Beginning
Our Beginning
Through the years,
Peddler's Wagon has become known as one of the area's best places for unique decor, creative gifts, realistic floral designs, and an amazing selection of Harvest and Christmas choices!​
We are fortunate to have been recognized and awarded by numerous festivals, magazines, and organizations for creative designs and display ideas as well as civic involvement and improvement in the local community.
"Florida Retailer of the Year"
- Florida Retail Federation
"50 Best and Brightest Stars"
-Home Accents Today
"Best of the Best"
- Home Decor and Gift
Lake Magazine
"Shining Star Award"
- Eustis Main Street
"Community Service Award"
- Lake County League of Cities
And Tomorrow
Our Beginning
And Tomorrow
It is always been our goal, and we hope to continue to provide you with a unique shopping experience for gift and home decor ideas.
We would like to continue to serve our guests and remain a viable part of our community for many years to come.
We hope to see you soon, and invite you to experience our shop...to enjoy all that is Peddler's Wagon
...a place like no other!
